languages.text: Варп кипит, освещенный источаемыми кораблем безумными, невозможными цветами. Скрежеща зубами от боли, дежурный докладывает, что на борту корабля врага творится нечестивое колдовство огромных масштабов — тысячи жертв приносятся {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Темным богам{/g}, раздирая вуаль. Богомерзкий портал, извергший еретиков, бешено сияет энергиями варпа.

The warp is boiling, illuminated by the mad, impossible colours exuded by the ship. Gnashing his teeth in pain, the duty officer reports that an unholy sorcery of immense proportions is taking place aboard the enemy vessel, where thousands of sacrifices are being offered to the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Dark Gods{/g}, tearing the veil asunder. The abominable portal that spewed out the heretics is ablaze with roiling warp energies.

The abominable portal that spewed out the heretics is ablaze with roiling warp energies.

languages.text: Der Warp kocht und wird von den verrückten, unmöglichen Farben des Schiffs erhellt. Der diensthabende Offizier meldet mit schmerzverzerrtem Gesicht, dass sich eine unheilige Magie von enormem Ausmaß auf dem feindlichen Schiff ausbreitet, auf dem den {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}dunklen Göttern{/g} Tausende von Opfern dargebracht werden, um den Schleier zu zerfetzen. In dem abscheulichen Portal, das die Ketzer ausgespuckt hat, wüten die Energien des Warp.
languages.original_text: The warp is boiling, illuminated by the mad, impossible colours exuded by the ship. Gnashing his teeth in pain, the duty officer reports that an unholy sorcery of immense proportions is taking place aboard the enemy vessel, where thousands of sacrifices are being offered to the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Dark Gods{/g}, tearing the veil asunder. The abominable portal that spewed out the heretics is ablaze with roiling warp energies.

Der diensthabende Offizier meldet mit schmerzverzerrtem Gesicht, dass sich eine unheilige Magie von enormem Ausmaß auf dem feindlichen Schiff ausbreitet, auf dem den dunklen Göttern Tausende von Opfern dargebracht werden, um den Schleier zu zerfetzen. In dem abscheulichen Portal, das die Ketzer ausgespuckt hat, wüten die Energien des Warp.

Der diensthabende Offizier meldet mit schmerzverzerrtem Gesicht, dass sich eine unheilige Magie von enormem Ausmaß auf dem feindlichen Schiff ausbreitet, auf dem den dunklen Göttern Tausende von Opfern dargebracht werden, um den Schleier zu zerfetzen. In dem abscheulichen Portal, das die Ketzer ausgespuckt hat, wüten die Energien des Warp.

languages.text: Le Warp bouillonne, illuminé par la débauche de couleurs démentes émises par le vaisseau. Grinçant des dents sous l'effet de la douleur, l'officier de quart vous informe qu'une sorcellerie impie aux proportions alarmantes sévit sur le vaisseau adverse, où des milliers de victimes sont offertes en sacrifice aux {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}dieux des ténèbres{/g}, déchirant ainsi le voile. L'abominable portail dont les hérétiques ont surgi s'embrase à la faveur des énergies tourbillonnantes du Warp.
languages.original_text: The warp is boiling, illuminated by the mad, impossible colours exuded by the ship. Gnashing his teeth in pain, the duty officer reports that an unholy sorcery of immense proportions is taking place aboard the enemy vessel, where thousands of sacrifices are being offered to the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Dark Gods{/g}, tearing the veil asunder. L'abominable portail dont les hérétiques ont surgi s'embrase à la faveur des énergies tourbillonnantes du Warp.

languages.text: La disformidad es un hervidero iluminado por los colores imposibles y enloquecedores que emanan de la nave. El oficial de guardia, apretando los dientes por el dolor, informa de que se está produciendo una brujería blasfema de escala incomprensible a bordo de la nave, en la que se ofrecen miles de sacrificios a los {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Dioses Oscuros{/g} para desgarrar el velo. El portal aborrecible del que han salido los herejes arde con las turbulentas energías de la disformidad.
languages.original_text: The warp is boiling, illuminated by the mad, impossible colours exuded by the ship. Gnashing his teeth in pain, the duty officer reports that an unholy sorcery of immense proportions is taking place aboard the enemy vessel, where thousands of sacrifices are being offered to the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Dark Gods{/g}, tearing the veil asunder. The abominable portal that spewed out the heretics is ablaze with roiling warp energies.

languages.text: <歪み>が沸騰し、船から放たれる狂気じみた異常な色彩に照らされる。痛みに歯を食いしばりつつ、当直士官は、敵管内で巨大な規模で邪悪な魔術が行われていること、{g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}暗黒神{/g}に何千もの生贄が捧げられており、ヴェールが引き裂かれていることを報告する。異端者たちを吐き出した忌まわしいポータルは、荒れ狂う<歪み>のエネルギーで燃え上がっている。
languages.original_text: The warp is boiling, illuminated by the mad, impossible colours exuded by the ship. Gnashing his teeth in pain, the duty officer reports that an unholy sorcery of immense proportions is taking place aboard the enemy vessel, where thousands of sacrifices are being offered to the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Dark Gods{/g}, tearing the veil asunder. The abominable portal that spewed out the heretics is ablaze with roiling warp energies.

traits.locale_text: <歪み>が沸騰し、船から放たれる狂気じみた異常な色彩に照らされる。痛みに歯を食いしばりつつ、当直士官は、敵管内で巨大な規模で邪悪な魔術が行われていること、暗黒神に何千もの生贄が捧げられており、ヴェールが引き裂かれていることを報告する。異端者たちを吐き出した忌まわしいポータルは、荒れ狂う<歪み>のエネルギーで燃え上がっている。

languages.text: 亚空间沸腾了，被那艘船不可思议的疯狂色彩照亮了。负责值班的军官咬着牙，忍着痛苦向你报告，说敌舰上爆发了一场规模巨大的邪恶巫术，成千上万的祭品被献给了{g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}黑暗诸神{/g}，刺穿了亚空间与真实世界之间的障壁。此刻，那扇大敞四开的邪恶传送门充满了可怕的亚空间能量。
languages.original_text: The warp is boiling, illuminated by the mad, impossible colours exuded by the ship. Gnashing his teeth in pain, the duty officer reports that an unholy sorcery of immense proportions is taking place aboard the enemy vessel, where thousands of sacrifices are being offered to the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Dark Gods{/g}, tearing the veil asunder. The abominable portal that spewed out the heretics is ablaze with roiling warp energies.

亚空间沸腾了，被那艘船不可思议的疯狂色彩照亮了。负责值班的军官咬着牙，忍着痛苦向你报告，说敌舰上爆发了一场规模巨大的邪恶巫术，成千上万的祭品被献给了黑暗诸神，刺穿了亚空间与真实世界之间的障壁。此刻，那扇大敞四开的邪恶传送门充满了可怕的亚空间能量。

languages.text: Öteboyut kaynıyor, çılgınlıkla aydınlanıyor, gemiden tarifi imkânsız renkler yayılıyor. Acı içinde dişlerini gıcırdatan görevli subay, muazzam boyutlardaki günahkâr bir sahirliğin düşman gemisinin güvertesinde vuku bulduğunu raporluyor. Gemi güvertesinde {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}kara tanrılara{/g} binlerce kişi kurban edilerek örtü paramparça ediliyor. Kâfirleri dört bir yana salan menfur geçit, çalkalanan öteboyut enerjileriyle alev alev yanıyor.
languages.original_text: The warp is boiling, illuminated by the mad, impossible colours exuded by the ship. Gnashing his teeth in pain, the duty officer reports that an unholy sorcery of immense proportions is taking place aboard the enemy vessel, where thousands of sacrifices are being offered to the {g|Encyclopedia:ChaosGlossary}Dark Gods{/g}, tearing the veil asunder.
